headline: Liberty Broadband: Now A Simple Charter Tracking Stock, But That Could Be Interesting
summary: Explore Liberty Broadband (LBRDA) as a value entry into Charter stock. Analyze risks and growth trends in broadband and wireless.

headline: Will Spectrum's New App Store and Tech Partnerships Redefine Charter Communications' (CHTR) Investment Narrative?
summary: Earlier this month, Spectrum unveiled The Spectrum App Store, a digital marketplace enabling TV and non-video customers to activate, upgrade, and manage major streaming apps, and announced collaborations with leading content and technology partners like Apple and Amazon. The launch reflects Spectrum's efforts to evolve its entertainment model, combining traditional live TV with seamless access to high-demand streaming content as well as immersive technology experiences for sports fans. We'll...

headline: AI, Amazon Drive Applied Optoelectronics' $1.9 Billion Revenue Forecast
summary: Analysts expect Applied Optoelectronics' revenue to spike 666% by 2027 on data center and AI demand, as well as deals with Amazon and Charter.
